pr_title: Add possibility to configure LDAP referral mode

timeline.message: added possibility to configure ldap referral mode
added possibility to configure ldap referral mode

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't it be IGNORE? Or is the config converter smart enough to uppercase that? /cc @dmlloyd @radcortez @geoand  ?
timeline.author: gastaldi
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -26,12 +28,19 @@
     @ConfigItem
     public Optional<String> password;
 
+    /**
+     * how ldap redirects are handled
+     */

replies.bodyText: Judging by the passing tests, I'd say that should be okay. +1 from me ;)
replies.author: gastaldi

replies.bodyText: I am pretty sure it will work as is
replies.author: geoand

replies.bodyText: Yeah, it was me recommending ignore. The values included for the documentation for enums are lowercased/kebab-cased. So whenever you define a default value for an enum, better use default-value rather than DEFAULT_VALUE. This way, it's consistent with the list of available values.
replies.author: gsmet
